verses.verse: וְכָל־ <WH3605> ve-chol all יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El So all Israel הִתְיַחְשׂ֔וּ <WH3187> hit-yach-Su, were reckoned by genealogies וְהִנָּ֣ם <WH2009> ve-hin-Nam and behold כְּתוּבִ֔ים <WH3789> ke-tu-Vim, and behold they [were] written עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- in סֵ֖פֶר <WH5612> Se-fer in the book מַלְכֵ֣י <WH4428> mal-Chei of the kings יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El; of Israel וִיהוּדָ֛ה <WH3063> vi-hu-Dah and Judah הָגְל֥וּ <WH1540> ha-ge-Lu [who] were carried away לְבָבֶ֖ל <WH894> le-va-Vel to Babylon בְּמַעֲלָֽם׃ <WH4604> be-ma-'a-Lam. for their transgression ס sa-Mek

וְהַיּוֹשְׁבִים֙ <WH3427> ve-hai-yo-she-Vim inhabitants הָרִ֣אשֹׁנִ֔ים <WH7223> ha-Ri-sho-Nim, Now the first אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> 'a-Sher who בַּאֲחֻזָּתָ֖ם <WH272> ba-'a-chuz-za-Tam that [dwelt] in their possessions בְּעָרֵיהֶ֑ם <WH5892> be-'a-rei-Hem; in their cities יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El [were] the Israelites הַכֹּ֣הֲנִ֔ים <WH3548> hak-Ko-ha-Nim, the priests הַלְוִיִּ֖ם <WH3881> hal-vi-Yim Levites וְהַנְּתִינִֽים׃ <WH5411> ve-han-ne-ti-Nim. and the Nethinims

וּבִירוּשָׁלִַ֙ם֙ <WH3389> u-vi-ru-sha-Lim And in Jerusalem יָשְׁב֔וּ <WH3427> ya-she-Vu, dwelt מִן־ <WH4480> min- Some בְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> be-Nei of the children יְהוּדָ֖ה <WH3063> ye-hu-Dah of Judah וּמִן־ <WH4480> u-min- Some בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> be-Nei and of the children בִנְיָמִ֑ן <WH1144> vin-ya-Min; of Benjamin וּמִן־ <WH4480> u-min- Some בְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> be-Nei and of the children אֶפְרַ֖יִם <WH669> 'ef-Ra-yim of Ephraim וּמְנַשֶּֽׁה׃ <WH4519> u-me-nash-Sheh. and Manasseh

עוּתַ֨י <WH5793> 'u-Tai Uthai בֶּן־ <WH1121> ben- the son עַמִּיה֤וּד <WH5989> 'am-mi-Hud of Ammihud בֶּן־ <WH1121> ben- the son עָמְרִי֙ <WH6018> 'a-me-Ri of Omri בֶּן־ <WH1121> ben- the son אִמְרִ֣י <WH566> 'im-Ri of Imri בֶן־ <WH1121> ven- the son; בָּנִימִן־ ba-ni-min- כבָּנִ֔י ba-Ni, ק; מִן־ <WH1144> min- Benjamin בְּנֵי־ <WH1137> be-nei- of Bani פֶ֖רֶץ <WH6557> Fe-retz of Pharez קבֶּן־ <WH1121> ben- of the children יְהוּדָֽה׃ <WH3063> ye-hu-Dah. of Judah

וּמִן־ <WH4480> u-min- From הַשִּׁ֣ילוֹנִ֔י <WH7888> hash-Shi-lo-Ni, And of the Shilonites עֲשָׂיָ֥ה <WH6222> 'a-sa-Yah Asaiah הַבְּכ֖וֹר <WH1060> hab-be-Chor the firstborn וּבָנָֽיו׃ <WH1121> u-va-Nav. and his sons

וּמִן־ <WH4480> u-min- and of בְּנֵי־ <WH1121> be-nei- And of the sons זֶ֖רַח <WH2226> Ze-rach of Zerah יְעוּאֵ֑ל <WH3262> ye-'u-'El; Jeuel וַאֲחֵיהֶ֖ם <WH251> va-'a-chei-Hem and their brethren שֵׁשׁ־ <WH8337> shesh- six מֵא֥וֹת <WH3967> me-'ot hundred וְתִשְׁעִֽים׃ <WH8673> ve-tish-'Im. and ninety

וּמִן־ <WH4480> u-min- From בְּנֵ֖י <WH1121> be-Nei And of the sons בִּנְיָמִ֑ן <WH1144> bin-ya-Min; of Benjamin סַלּוּא֙ <WH5543> sal-Lu Sallu בֶּן־ <WH1121> ben- the son מְשֻׁלָּ֔ם <WH4918> me-shul-Lam, of Meshullam בֶּן־ <WH1121> ben- the son הוֹדַוְיָ֖ה <WH1938> ho-dav-Yah of Hodaviah בֶּן־ <WH1121> ben- the son הַסְּנֻאָֽה׃ <WH5574> has-se-nu-'Ah. of Hasenuah

וְיִבְנְיָה֙ <WH2997> ve-yiv-ne-Yah And Ibneiah בֶּן־ <WH1121> ben- the son יְרֹחָ֔ם <WH3395> ye-ro-Cham, of Jeroham וְאֵלָ֥ה <WH425> ve-'e-Lah and Elah בֶן־ <WH1121> ven- the son עֻזִּ֖י <WH5813> 'uz-Zi of Uzzi בֶּן־ <WH1121> ben- the son מִכְרִ֑י <WH4381> mich-Ri; of Michri וּמְשֻׁלָּם֙ <WH4918> u-me-shul-Lam and Meshullam בֶּן־ <WH1121> ben- the son שְׁפַטְיָ֔ה <WH8203> she-fat-Yah, of Shephathiah בֶּן־ <WH1121> ben- the son רְעוּאֵ֖ל <WH7467> re-'u-'El of Reuel בֶּן־ <WH1121> ben- the son יִבְנִיָּֽה׃ <WH2998> yiv-ni-Yah. of Ibnijah

וַאֲחֵיהֶם֙ <WH251> va-'a-chei-Hem And their brethren לְתֹ֣לְדוֹתָ֔ם <WH8435> le-To-le-do-Tam, according to their generations תְּשַׁ֥ע <WH8672> te-Sha' nine מֵא֖וֹת <WH3967> me-'ot hundred וַחֲמִשִּׁ֣ים <WH2572> va-cha-mish-Shim and fifty וְשִׁשָּׁ֑ה <WH8337> ve-shish-Shah; and six כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- All אֵ֣לֶּה <WH428> 'El-leh these אֲנָשִׁ֔ים <WH376> 'a-na-Shim, he רָאשֵׁ֥י <WH7218> ra-Shei [were] chief אָב֖וֹת <WH1> a-Vot of the fathers לְבֵ֥ית <WH1004> le-Veit in the house אֲבֹתֵיהֶֽם׃ <WH1> 'a-vo-tei-Hem. of their fathers ס sa-Mek

וּמִן־ <WH4480> u-min- From הַֽכֹּהֲנִ֑ים <WH3548> hak-ko-ha-Nim; And of the priests יְדַֽעְיָ֥ה <WH3048> ye-da'-Yah Jedaiah וִיהוֹיָרִ֖יב <WH3080> vi-ho-ya-Riv and Jehoiarib וְיָכִֽין׃ <WH3199> ve-ya-Chin. and Jachin

וַעֲזַרְיָ֨ה <WH5838> va-'a-zar-Yah And Azariah בֶן־ <WH1121> ven- the son חִלְקִיָּ֜ה <WH2518> chil-ki-Yah of Hilkiah בֶּן־ <WH1121> ben- the son מְשֻׁלָּ֣ם <WH4918> me-shul-Lam of Meshullam בֶּן־ <WH1121> ben- the son צָד֗וֹק <WH6659> tza-Dok, of Zadok בֶּן־ <WH1121> ben- the son מְרָיוֹת֙ <WH4812> me-ra-yOt of Meraioth בֶּן־ <WH1121> ben- the son אֲחִיט֔וּב <WH285> 'a-chi-Tuv, of Ahitub נְגִ֖יד <WH5057> ne-Gid the ruler בֵּ֥ית <WH1004> beit of the house הָאֱלֹהִֽים׃ <WH430> ha-'E-lo-Him. of God ס sa-Mek

וַעֲדָיָה֙ <WH5718> va-'a-da-Yah And Adaiah בֶּן־ <WH1121> ben- the son יְרֹחָ֔ם <WH3395> ye-ro-Cham, of Jeroham בֶּן־ <WH1121> ben- the son פַּשְׁח֖וּר <WH6583> pash-Chur of Pashur בֶּן־ <WH1121> ben- the son מַלְכִּיָּ֑ה <WH4441> mal-ki-Yah; of Malchijah וּמַעְשַׂ֨י <WH4640> u-ma'-Sai and Maasiai בֶּן־ <WH1121> ben- the son עֲדִיאֵ֧ל <WH5717> 'a-di-'El of Adiel בֶּן־ <WH1121> ben- the son יַחְזֵ֛רָה <WH3170> yach-Ze-rah of Jahzerah בֶּן־ <WH1121> ben- the son מְשֻׁלָּ֥ם <WH4918> me-shul-Lam of Meshullam בֶּן־ <WH1121> ben- the son מְשִׁלֵּמִ֖ית <WH4921> me-shil-le-Mit of Meshillemith בֶּן־ <WH1121> ben- the son אִמֵּֽר׃ <WH564> 'im-Mer. of Immer

וַאֲחֵיהֶ֗ם <WH251> va-'a-chei-Hem, And their brethren רָאשִׁים֙ <WH7218> ra-Shim heads לְבֵ֣ית <WH1004> le-Veit of the house אֲבוֹתָ֔ם <WH1> a-vo-Tam, of their fathers אֶ֕לֶף <WH505> 'E-lef a thousand וּשְׁבַ֥ע <WH7651> u-she-Va' and seven מֵא֖וֹת <WH3967> me-'ot hundred וְשִׁשִּׁ֑ים <WH8346> ve-shish-Shim; and threescore גִּבּ֣וֹרֵי <WH1368> gib-Bo-rei men חֵ֔יל <WH2428> Cheil, very able מְלֶ֖אכֶת <WH4399> me-Le-chet for the work עֲבוֹדַ֥ת <WH5656> a-vo-Dat of the service בֵּית־ <WH1004> beit- of the house הָאֱלֹהִֽים׃ <WH430> ha-'E-lo-Him. of God

וּמִֽן־ <WH4480> u-min- at הַלְוִיִּ֑ם <WH3881> hal-vi-Yim; And of the Levites שְׁמַֽעְיָ֧ה <WH8098> she-ma'-Yah Shemaiah בֶן־ <WH1121> ven- the son חַשּׁ֛וּב <WH2815> chash-Shuv of Hasshub בֶּן־ <WH1121> ben- the son עַזְרִיקָ֥ם <WH5840> 'az-ri-Kam of Azrikam בֶּן־ <WH1121> ben- the son חֲשַׁבְיָ֖ה <WH2811> cha-shav-Yah of Hashabiah מִן־ <WH4480> min- at בְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> be-Nei of the sons מְרָרִֽי׃ <WH4847> me-ra-Ri. of Merari

וּבַקְבַּקַּ֥ר <WH1230> u-vak-bak-Kar And Bakbakkar חֶ֖רֶשׁ <WH2792> Che-resh Heresh וְגָלָ֑ל <WH1559> ve-ga-Lal; and Galal וּמַתַּנְיָה֙ <WH4983> u-mat-tan-Yah and Mattaniah בֶּן־ <WH1121> ben- the son מִיכָ֔א <WH4316> mi-Cha, of Micah בֶּן־ <WH1121> ben- the son זִכְרִ֖י <WH2147> zich-Ri of Zichri בֶּן־ <WH1121> ben- the son אָסָֽף׃ <WH623> 'a-Saf. of Asaph

וְעֹבַדְיָה֙ <WH5662> ve-'oad-Yah And Obadiah בֶּֽן־ <WH1121> ben- the son שְׁמַֽעְיָ֔ה <WH8098> she-ma'-Yah, of Shemaiah בֶּן־ <WH1121> ben- the son גָּלָ֖ל <WH1559> ga-Lal of Galal בֶּן־ <WH1121> ben- the son יְדוּת֑וּן <WH3038> ye-du-Tun; of Jeduthun וּבֶרֶכְיָ֤ה <WH1296> u-ve-rech-Yah and Berechiah בֶן־ <WH1121> ven- the son אָסָא֙ <WH609> 'a-Sa of Asa בֶּן־ <WH1121> ben- the son אֶלְקָנָ֔ה <WH511> 'el-ka-Nah, of Elkanah הַיּוֹשֵׁ֖ב <WH3427> hai-yo-Shev that dwelt בְּחַצְרֵ֥י <WH2691> be-chatz-Rei in the villages נְטוֹפָתִֽי׃ <WH5200> ne-to-fa-Ti. of the Netophathites

וְהַשֹּׁעֲרִים֙ <WH7778> ve-hash-sho-'a-Rim And the porters שַׁלּ֣וּם <WH7967> shal-Lum [were] Shallum וְעַקּ֔וּב <WH6126> ve-'ak-Kuv, and Akkub וְטַלְמֹ֖ן <WH2929> ve-tal-Mon and Talmon וַאֲחִימָ֑ן <WH289> va-'a-chi-Man; and Ahiman וַאֲחִיהֶ֥ם <WH251> va-'a-chi-Hem and their brethren שַׁלּ֖וּם <WH7967> shal-Lum Shallum הָרֹֽאשׁ׃ <WH7218> ha-Rosh. [was] the chief

וְֽעַד־ <WH5704> ve-'ad- until הֵ֔נָּה <WH2008> Hen-nah, now בְּשַׁ֥עַר <WH8179> be-Sha-'ar gate הַמֶּ֖לֶךְ <WH4428> ham-Me-lech Who hitherto [waited] in the king's מִזְרָ֑חָה <WH4217> miz-Ra-chah; eastward הֵ֚מָּה <WH1992> Hem-mah like הַשֹּׁ֣עֲרִ֔ים <WH7778> hash-Sho-'a-Rim, they [were] porters לְמַחֲנ֖וֹת <WH4264> le-ma-cha-Not in the companies בְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> be-Nei of the children לֵוִֽי׃ <WH3878> le-Vi. of Levi

וְשַׁלּ֣וּם <WH7967> ve-shal-Lum And Shallum בֶּן־ <WH1121> ben- the son ק֠וֹרֵא <WH6981> Ko-re of Kore בֶּן־ <WH1121> ben- the son אֶבְיָסָ֨ף <WH43> 'ev-ya-Saf of Ebiasaph בֶּן־ <WH1121> ben- the son קֹ֜רַח <WH7141> Ko-rach of Korah וְֽאֶחָ֧יו <WH251> ve-'e-Chav and his brethren לְבֵית־ <WH1004> le-veit- of the house אָבִ֣יו <WH1> 'a-Viv of his father הַקָּרְחִ֗ים <WH7145> hak-ka-re-Chim, the Korahites עַ֚ל <WH5921> 'al over מְלֶ֣אכֶת <WH4399> me-Le-chet [were] over the work הָעֲבוֹדָ֔ה <WH5656> ha-'a-vo-Dah, of the service שֹׁמְרֵ֥י <WH8104> sho-me-Rei keepers הַסִּפִּ֖ים <WH5592> has-sip-Pim of the gates לָאֹ֑הֶל <WH168> la-'O-hel; of the tabernacle וַאֲבֹֽתֵיהֶם֙ <WH1> va-'a-vo-tei-Hem and their fathers עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- had been over מַחֲנֵ֣ה <WH4264> ma-cha-Neh [being] over the host יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> Yah-weh, of the LORD שֹׁמְרֵ֖י <WH8104> sho-me-Rei [were] keepers הַמָּבֽוֹא׃ <WH3996> ham-ma-Vo. of the entry

וּפִֽינְחָ֣ס <WH6372> u-fin-Chas And Phinehas בֶּן־ <WH1121> ben- the son אֶלְעָזָ֗ר <WH499> 'el-'a-Zar, of Eleazar נָגִ֨יד <WH5057> na-Gid was the ruler הָיָ֧ה <WH1961> ha-Yah become עֲלֵיהֶ֛ם <WH5921> 'a-lei-Hem over לְפָנִ֖ים <WH6440> le-fa-Nim over them in time past יְהוָ֥ה׀ <WH3068> Yah-weh [and] the LORD עִמּֽוֹ׃ <WH5973> im-Mo. with

זְכַרְיָה֙ <WH2148> ze-char-Yah [And] Zechariah בֶּ֣ן <WH1121> ben the son מְשֶֽׁלֶמְיָ֔ה <WH4920> me-she-lem-Yah, of Meshelemiah שֹׁעֵ֥ר <WH7778> sho-'Er [was] porter פֶּ֖תַח <WH6607> Pe-tach of the door לְאֹ֥הֶל <WH168> le-'O-hel of the tabernacle מוֹעֵֽד׃ <WH4150> mo-'Ed. of the congregation

כֻּלָּ֤ם <WH3605> kul-Lam these הַבְּרוּרִים֙ <WH1305> hab-be-ru-Rim All these [which were] chosen לְשֹׁעֲרִ֣ים <WH7778> le-sho-'a-Rim to be porters בַּסִּפִּ֔ים <WH5592> bas-sip-Pim, in the gates מָאתַ֖יִם <WH3967> ma-Ta-yim [were] two hundred וּשְׁנֵ֣ים <WH8147> u-she-Neim both עָשָׂ֑ר <WH6240> 'a-Sar; ten הֵ֤מָּה <WH1992> Hem-mah whom בְחַצְרֵיהֶם֙ <WH2691> ve-chatz-rei-Hem in their villages הִתְיַחְשָׂ֔ם <WH3187> hit-yach-Sam, These were reckoned by their genealogy הֵ֣מָּה <WH1992> Hem-mah whom יִסַּ֥ד <WH3245> yis-Sad did ordain דָּוִ֛יד <WH1732> da-Vid David וּשְׁמוּאֵ֥ל <WH8050> u-she-mu-'El and Samuel הָרֹאֶ֖ה <WH7200> ha-ro-'Eh the seer בֶּאֱמוּנָתָֽם׃ <WH530> be-'e-mu-na-Tam. in their set office

וְהֵ֨ם <WH1992> ve-Hem they וּבְנֵיהֶ֜ם <WH1121> u-ve-nei-Hem So they and their children עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- had charge הַשְּׁעָרִ֧ים <WH8179> hash-she-'a-Rim [had] the oversight of the gates לְבֵית־ <WH1004> le-veit- of the house יְהוָ֛ה <WH3068> Yah-weh of the LORD לְבֵ֥ית־ <WH1004> le-Veit- [namely] the house הָאֹ֖הֶל <WH168> ha-'O-hel of the tabernacle לְמִשְׁמָרֽוֹת׃ <WH4931> le-mish-ma-Rot. by wards

לְאַרְבַּ֣ע <WH702> le-'ar-Ba' In four רוּח֔וֹת <WH7307> ru-Chot, quarters יִהְי֖וּ <WH1961> yih-Yu become הַשֹּׁעֲרִ֑ים <WH7778> hash-sho-'a-Rim; were the porters מִזְרָ֥ח <WH4217> miz-Rach toward the east יָ֖מָּה <WH3220> Yam-mah west צָפ֥וֹנָה <WH6828> tza-Fo-nah north וָנֶֽגְבָּה׃ <WH5045> va-Neg-bah. and south
